name: Basileía Romaíon -  0.15 'Palaiologos Renaissance'
short_description: What if the Basileía ton Romaíon (Roman Empire in Medieval Greek) never ended in the east? always retaining Anatolia and Greece and slowly regaining limited control over the Balkans, Levant, Egypt and north eastern Africa? What if the Romaíoi (Greek speaking eastern Romans) continued to influence the course of events throughout Europa, Asia, Africa and the New World?
